item.title: [video] – Evan Williams on “How Twitter’s spectacular growth is being driven by unexpected uses”
item.description: The next video is about twitter’s growth by the unexpected use of the service. Very intersting video! This video I found on the gorgeous TED Talks. Enjoy watching.
